tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
  city VARCHAR,
  time TIMESTAMP,
  vehicle_count INT,
  avg_speed FLOAT
)
CREATE TABLE traffic_cameras ( camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), status VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE traffic_sensors ( sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location VARCHAR(255), type VARCHAR(50), status VARCHAR(50) )
CREATE TABLE traffic_incidents ( incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY, type VARCHAR(50), location VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, date_time TIMESTAMP )
CREATE TABLE traffic_patterns ( pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY, pattern_name VARCHAR(100), description TEXT, analysis_results JSON )

CREATE TABLE traffic_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
  speed FLOAT NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
